message.body: Hey, I was a bit confused about your shore trip tomorrow. Are you going with Ella, boyfriend, both?
Just boyfriend...
I am without child on mondays, already talking with the GF about heading down the shore with her toddler-- should we perhaps all rendezvous?
I think we're heading to brigantine to meet a friend of Sochi who has a beach house there. Where and what do y'all have planned?

We now have to wait until Nate is done with his meeting at one. We don't know whether to go after or wait till Tuesday but there is a chance of rain tues. we are going to sea isle city me thinks...island beach state park
What jew'all up to?
I'm in school! Ella is with grandma overnight, ima studying like crazy already!
Want to hang with kiddos this weekend?
I cannot say. Training at white dog this weekend!
That's awesome! Keeping it in the family!
I am about to pick up the bot from his mama's. Could we stop by your abode?
Sure!
20 minz...
Are u with child tonight? I need Ella to hang with someone for an hour...
Nope. Going to Easton with Sochi to see Kishi Bashi!
Whoa! That's awesome! Have fun!
Park? Kids? Adventure?

Tomorrow, yes. Herberq has theatre camp until noon, then we were thinking of stopping in on Ari's block party, though I am hesitant, because I don't like to feel trapped at functions I don't want to attend.
We were going to go too! Go, we will be trapped there together
Are y'all coming? I'm watching college football with Corey; I think I may cut out soon..
Yo! We are on our way, don't leave!
You home?
Nope, at skool all day!
Just leaving now. What should I do?
If I receive no redirection en route I shall head home..
Turning in.. We are not leaving until 10am and then back by 8pm tomorrow so just let me know. Goodnight.
Sorry, I fell asleep with the lights on last night. I will swing over tonight, let me know when u are home, have fun at the beach!
You there? I am picking up the wee lad today, then we're walking home, possibly passing through Clarque for some play..
Where did we go in north Philly for Korean?
Everyday good house!
So awesome
Chelsa is dating Jordan, your ex! Icky!
That is his name, right? The mustachioed and misshapen Cedar Park art therapist?
What!!!!! That's crazy!!!!!
Is she into him? He loves dating single mothers!
Milfadelphia!
For realz, this is so bizarre
Clark park?
Park?
At work! Tomorrow afternoon?
At school, bummer!
Do you guys want to go to the woods?
Not with the bot until tomorrow, then I'm hanging with him and his older brother, in town for the weekend, so we'll probably perambulate in the hood. Rendezvous en Clarque Saturday?
Yeah that sounds great! Let us know when abouts you plan on going
Mushing through the arctic ululation towards Camp Clark with a small cadre of junior explorers. Join our expedition?
Y'all still alive?? Wanna go somewhere with us tomorrow after school? Thinking of borrowing the GF's Prius and driving out into the cut..
That sounds amazing, lets do it!
Cool. I'll let you know.
No car this aft, unfortunately, though it looks nice enough for a park visit. We'll probably walk to Clark-- join us or meet there?
Yeah we will do the same for sure! Let me know when you are going
Dobkin and I are at farm!
Whaa??? I miss that Dobkin lass. Don't much miss your present environs, though. Say hi to Timmytoddleen. I wish I could fold a stack with y'all..
It has expired! I checked.
Miss you guys, lets all hang while I am free from the machine for winter break. Or we can go out for boozy brunch when the kids are in school : D
Back from the desert! Clark with the kiddies tomorrow?
I'm not getting Ella from Wes until 430..can you take a trip tomorrow ?
Nicht. I work today. We miss y'all! Soon!
Boo work! We miss you guys too!
I'm cold and turning green from sunlessness and growing blind crazy eyes like a potato. Let's do something fun with the kiddies tomorrow to combat this, please!
Aquarium?!?!
I wish there was a tropical greenhouse with a bikram playground. The Clark bowl should be retractably domed! The aquarium gave me anxiety, I think.
The dome is a wonderful idea. The aquarium gives Ella anxiety too. Natural science museum?
Maybe we could sneak into a CC hotel swimming pool! I would be into sledding, though, if the kids are down. Might be our only chance this winter.

I think we're going sledding. I realize this may not be an appropriate activity for Ella, but y'all are very welcome to join us if you want to give it a try. We usually turn to the hot chocolate after a solid half hour, anyway.
We'll start trudging down around noon..
We have the same plans!! We have a new sled to try out!
Sweet! We'll see you there!
I saw you on your bike on spruce!
Working it out-- just got dumped!
Oh no! I'm sorry, are you ok?
Yeah, a bit relieved, actually. We'll have to talk soon.. Tuesday, would you be into dinner with the kids?
Clarque?
We are in the mundane world of laundry!
Jai is coming over at three, is that too late?
I don't know, we may be gone by then, we'll see. We intend to start our amble in 20.
Clark??
You around in the am tomorrow?
With your kid.
No, we are not going to be home. Relatives from Maine are visiting, so we are out of philly visiting them. We need to hang soon!
Indeed! Hit us up soon!
Will do!
What are y'all up to tomorrow?
Dunno, supposed to go to a BBQ for Easter. What are u guys doing?
It's been forever. Let's catch up on a park bench this week.
This weekend is supposed to be nice. Maybe we could all picnic

I really want to forage for ramps in Chester co tomorrow; I think I remember my ex-chef's secret spot, but I don't have a car. Do you? Wanna search for ramps while the kids look for pokemon? My present chef will pay market rate for them, so we could net s
I would love some ramps! I like to make spring tonic with them. Alas I have school. Could we go Saturday?
O yes! That's what I was thinking, I somehow skipped a day.
Wonderful! Lets do it!
Sweet! 11 would be good for us. Would a picnic be too ambitious? Or we could get lunch in Media or somesuch towne. (I've got some delicious verdure, as well!)
Could we do noon? I'm picking Ella up from her dads that am and neither of us are good at early starts
Noon is good. I'll text you on Saturday morning to firm it up.
We still on?
Yes! What time should we get you guys?
Sure! Meet us at satallite
Cool.

The ramps are divine! I took each one under running water between my thumb and index and drew the outer skin back down the stalk then pinched off the hoary ends and sautéed them whole in EVOO and S and P-- so fuckin' good!
Yum! Going to do the same! Thanks again for taking us out there. Lets do something again soon. Good talking to u about life
Indeed! It was great to see you! Let's..
I'm trying to get to feasterville to buy a canoe tomorrow! Gas and free lunch if you can assist!
I'm going to the union game, I'm sorry I can't have a feasterville adventure. Canoe!!!!
Borrowing a car. There is urban canoeing in your future!
Wonderful!!!!!!
